archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0494
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a transitioning product owner, I want the Comarch system to publish a message of successful transiton in the CCM that will be subscribed by the legacy system to initiate the disconnect.

properties.value: Why via CCM? Maybe directly? Not to impact BSS with integrations with legacy. Note: Comarch will discuss internally on the best option. Probably a dedicated order flow will be needed anyway.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
